Texts.Eng:
I, Axelbrass Fuseamp III, hereby wager my keep and lands in a game of clunky jacks with the Baron, and herewith promise to provide the Baron with deeds to said property, in the unlikely event that he wins.

Should I win, I will be showered with the Baron's riches (and I will win, because I am really good at clunky jacks).
Texts.Por:
Eu, Axelbrass Fuseamp III, decidi apostar meu forte e as terras em um jogo de clunky jacks com o Barão, e com isto, a promessa de fornecer ao barão as escrituras ao referido imóvel, no caso improvável de que ele ganhe.

Caso eu ganhe, vou ser regado com as riquezas do Barão (e vou ganhar, porque eu sou realmente bom no clunky jacks).

Texts.Eng: Written proof of the rightful ownership of The Baron's Keep.
Texts.Por: Prova escrita da propriedade legítima do Forte do Barão
